summary: Comprehensive testing of Karion Trading Dashboard completed. All backend APIs (15/15) passed. Frontend features verified: Login with KARION branding, Home page with 4 multi-source analysis cards, COT page with expandable categories, Monte Carlo with dice animation and extended metrics, AI page with Karion AI branding and Intimate Analysis button.
passed_tests: Backend: API Root Endpoint - 200 OK
Backend: User Login (test@test.com / password123) - 200 OK with token
Backend: Multi-Source Analysis API - 4 assets with direction, p_up, confidence, impulse, drivers
Backend: COT Data API - 4 assets with bias, confidence, squeeze_risk, categories
Backend: COT Single Symbol API - Working
Backend: VIX API - Real data from Yahoo Finance
Backend: Market Prices API - All assets with real prices
Backend: Risk Analysis API - Complete risk score with components
Backend: Philosophy Quote API - Italian quotes
Backend: Psychology Stats API - Working with auth
Backend: Ascension Status API - Working with auth
Backend: Monte Carlo API - Returns median, avg_max_drawdown, worst_drawdown
Backend: Intimate Analysis API - Returns personalized AI analysis
Frontend: Login page shows KARION branding (fixed from previous 'Trading Hub')
Frontend: Home page - KARION title in header
Frontend: Home page - 4 market analysis cards (XAUUSD, NAS100, SP500, EURUSD)
Frontend: Home page - VIX/Regime bar with real data (VIX: 16.09, RISK-ON)
Frontend: Home page - Card click opens modal with direction, p_up, confidence, impulse, drivers, invalidation
Frontend: COT Page - Navigation via sidebar working
Frontend: COT Page - 4 assets with bias badges (Bull/Bear/Neutral)
Frontend: COT Page - Confidence, Crowding, Squeeze Risk metrics visible
Frontend: COT Page - Expandable category details (Asset Manager, Leveraged, Dealer)
Frontend: COT Page - Tabs (Overview, Indici, Gold, Forex) working
Frontend: COT Page - Next release countdown displayed
Frontend: Monte Carlo - Parameter inputs with 0.01% - 10% risk range
Frontend: Monte Carlo - Simulation runs with dice animation
Frontend: Monte Carlo - Results show Media, Mediana, Best/Worst Case, Max DD, Expectancy, Profit Factor, Kelly
Frontend: AI Page - Karion AI branding visible
Frontend: AI Page - Analisi Intima button present and clickable
Frontend: AI Page - Intimate Analysis modal opens with loading state
Frontend: AI Page - Quick action buttons (Coach, Risk, Psicologia, Strategia, Journal, Stats)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Backend uses yfinance for real VIX data. COT data is SIMULATED (not real CFTC data) but has realistic structure. Multi-source analysis engine combines VIX/Regime, Macro, News Flow, and COT positioning with asset-specific weights. Monte Carlo runs 10,000 simulations and returns extended metrics (median, avg_max_drawdown, worst_drawdown). AI intimate analysis uses Emergent LLM integration.

mocked_apis.COT Data: SIMULATED - Categories data is generated with realistic structure but not from real CFTC reports
mocked_apis.Multi-Source Drivers: PARTIALLY SIMULATED - VIX is real, other drivers (Macro, News, COT) are simulated

features_verified.login: Working with test@test.com / password123, KARION branding visible
features_verified.home_page_4_cards: XAUUSD, NAS100, SP500, EURUSD - all displaying with fixed height
features_verified.card_modal: Opens with direction, p_up, confidence, impulse, drivers, invalidation
features_verified.cot_4_assets: NAS100, SP500, XAUUSD, EURUSD with bias, confidence, squeeze_risk
features_verified.cot_expandable_categories: Asset Manager, Leveraged, Dealer categories expandable
features_verified.ai_karion_branding: Karion AI title and logo visible
features_verified.ai_intimate_analysis: Button present, modal opens with loading state
